FREE TUTORING for ALL UIC students in French, German, Spanish, and Italian 101, 102, 103, 104. Thatâ€™s YOU!     WHERE?   LCLC Peer Tutoring in French, German, and Italian is in 305 Grant Hall. Spanish Peer Tutoring is in 308 Grant Hall.     WHEN?   See our tutoring schedules page for DROP-IN TUTORING times for French, German, Italian, and Spanish.     WHAT CAN I ASK A TUTOR?   Questions about grammar, reading, speaking, listening, or just come to chat and practice your speaking skills.         More Questions?  EMAIL US!
